attributes.action:
LEAVE THE STREET LIGHTS ON AFTER MIDNIGHT. 
BRANT ROAD, LINCOLN
attributes.additional_details:
In the past year Crime in my area has risen and After being burgled myself and many residents down BRANT ROAD LINCOLN It is time for someone to take action.
I request street lights in this area to be left on and not turned off at midnight.
attributes.background:
Myself and many residents down BRANT ROAD LINCOLN have been burgled and in the recent months it’s got dramatically worse. It is a horrible feeling and makes you very very vulnerable. 

I propose ALL STREET LIGHTS to be left on after midnight.

Help US to feel safe again.

rejection.details:
Street lighting is a responsibility of individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can petition Lincoln City Council directly here: https://democratic.lincoln.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx
